meanings: 17-mora poem, usu. in 3 lines of 5, 7 and 5 morae

lessons.japanese: 俳句は季節と関連が深い。
lessons.english: Haiku are closely related to the seasons of the year.

lessons.japanese: この文は俳句の調べ持つ文よ。
lessons.english: This is a sentence that has the syllable count of a haiku.

lessons.english: This is a sentence that has the syllable count of a good haiku.
